title: How to Make Kalbi Marinade

steps.headline: Whisk all of the ingredients together.
Place the meat on a flat dish.
steps.description: Marinate the meat with the mixture and cover the dish for 12 hours or overnight. Seafood only needs to be marinated for two hours.

steps.headline: Drain and discard any remaining liquid before grilling or broiling your meat or fish.

text: Whisk all of the ingredients together.  Place the meat on a flat dish. Marinate the meat with the mixture and cover the dish for 12 hours or overnight. Seafood only needs to be marinated for two hours. Drain and discard any remaining liquid before grilling or broiling your meat or fish.  Finished.
